fields_of_interest: Consumers, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
eu_initiatives: DG MOVE policy initiatives; DG Research & Innovation activity in relation especially to transport aspects of Horizon 2020
membership:
Representative of Transport Focus and of TravelWatch SouthWest CIC in, and ad hoc spokesperson for, the European Passengers' Federation, a network of more than 30 public transport users' organisations currently drawn from over twenty European states. 
 
European policy adviser to Transport Focus, the statutory independent transport users' watchdog in Great Britain, focused on getting the best deal for passengers and for users of the strategic road network. 
 
Director of TravelWatch SouthWest, a community interest company that promotes the interests of public transport users in the South West of England. 
 
Member of the European Rail Research Advisory Council
goals__remit: Transport policy analysis & Promotion of the interests of users and potential users of public (collective) transport.
